author: Myles Worrell
description: Adapted from a recipe created by Myles Worrell at The Esquire Tavern in San Antonio, USA. Myles' original recipe called for 2oz Pineau des Charentes rouge, ½oz Paranubes Oaxacan rum, ½oz amontillado sherry and 1 dash Xocolatl Mole bitters.
name: Raisin' Cane

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
